title: Humanity Is Killing The Great Barrier Reef, Warns Report
content: The Great Barrier Reef will continue to deteriorate, largely due to climate change, and the window to secure its future is rapidly closing. That is the sobering conclusion of a major new report into the state of the reef.
summary: The Great Barrier Reef will continue to deteriorate, largely due to climate change, and the window to secure its future is rapidly closing. That is the sobering conclusion of a major new report into the state of the reef.

title: Iran-Backed Hezbollah Says It Launched Over 320 Katyusha Rockets At Israel
content: Hezbollah said Sunday it had launched more than 320 rockets at Israel overnight, targeting a string of military positions, even as Israel's military said it was carrying out pre-emptive strikes against the group.
summary: Hezbollah said Sunday it had launched more than 320 rockets at Israel overnight, targeting a string of military positions, even as Israel's military said it was carrying out pre-emptive strikes against the group.

title: Live: Israel, Hezbollah Attack Each Other As Middle East Tensions Flare Up
content: Israel today announced that it was conducting pre-emptive strikes in Lebanon after detecting preparations for "large-scale" attacks by the Iran-backed Hezbollah.
summary: Israel today announced that it was conducting pre-emptive strikes in Lebanon after detecting preparations for "large-scale" attacks by the Iran-backed Hezbollah.

title: "Self-Defence": Israel Says Fired On Lebanon To Prevent Hezbollah Attack
content: Israel today said that is launched strikes inside Lebanon as a "self-defence act" to prevent a Hezbollah attack on civilians, Israel Defense Forces spokesperson Daniel Hagari said.
summary: Israel today said that is launched strikes inside Lebanon as a "self-defence act" to prevent a Hezbollah attack on civilians, Israel Defense Forces spokesperson Daniel Hagari said.

title: Israel Declares Emergency As Hezbollah Announces "Large-Scale" Attacks
content: Lebanon-based Hezbollah announced on Sunday large-scale rocket and drone launches towards Israel in an "initial response" to a top commander's killing.
summary: Lebanon-based Hezbollah announced on Sunday large-scale rocket and drone launches towards Israel in an "initial response" to a top commander's killing.

title: Kamala Harris Faces Uphill Battle To Win Back Muslim Votes In Swing State
content: In key US swing state Michigan, Democratic voters of Arab and Middle Eastern heritage say Kamala Harris is going to have to win them back after they were alienated by President Joe Biden's handling of Israel's military offensive in Gaza.
summary: In key US swing state Michigan, Democratic voters of Arab and Middle Eastern heritage say Kamala Harris is going to have to win them back after they were alienated by President Joe Biden's handling of Israel's military offensive in Gaza.

title: Top US Scientist Hospitalised For West Nile Virus, Now Recovering At Home
content: The West Nile virus is mainly transmitted through the bite of infected mosquitoes.
summary: The West Nile virus is mainly transmitted through the bite of infected mosquitoes.

title: Why Starliner Will Return Without Sunita Williams And How Musk Will Help Her
content: Indian-origin astronaut Sunita Williams and her NASA colleague Butch Wilmore will now return home with billionaire Elon Musk's SpaceX next year.
summary: Indian-origin astronaut Sunita Williams and her NASA colleague Butch Wilmore will now return home with billionaire Elon Musk's SpaceX next year.

title: Who Is Pavel Durov, Telegram CEO Arrested In France
content: Pavel Durov, the billionaire founder and CEO of the Telegram messaging app, was arrested at the Bourget airport outside Paris on Saturday evening, French local media said, citing unnamed sources.
summary: Pavel Durov, the billionaire founder and CEO of the Telegram messaging app, was arrested at the Bourget airport outside Paris on Saturday evening, French local media said, citing unnamed sources.

title: How Boeing's Mission To Send Sunita Williams On Space Faced Setbacks
content: The decision to transfer the crew of Boeing's Starliner to a SpaceX mission after the spacecraft malfunctioned is just the latest twist in a long saga that has undermined the credibility of the US aerospace giant.
summary: The decision to transfer the crew of Boeing's Starliner to a SpaceX mission after the spacecraft malfunctioned is just the latest twist in a long saga that has undermined the credibility of the US aerospace giant.

title: Trump Struggles To Keep Media Spotlight In Battle With Kamala Harris
content: Donald Trump, touting plans on taxes and health, tried on Friday to turn the page on a week in which he was overshadowed by Kamala Harris and struggled to focus on policy issues instead of personal attacks on his opponent in the US presidential race.
summary: Donald Trump, touting plans on taxes and health, tried on Friday to turn the page on a week in which he was overshadowed by Kamala Harris and struggled to focus on policy issues instead of personal attacks on his opponent in the US presidential race.

title: Suspected German Festival Stabber Who Killed 3 Arrested
content: German police on Saturday arrested the suspected killer behind a knife rampage that left three people dead at a street festival, an attack claimed by the Islamic State group.
summary: German police on Saturday arrested the suspected killer behind a knife rampage that left three people dead at a street festival, an attack claimed by the Islamic State group.

title: Telegram Chief Pavel Durov Arrested For 'Lack Of Moderation' On App
content: Telegram chief executive Pavel Durov is expected to appear in court Sunday after being arrested by French police at an airport near Paris for alleged offences related to his popular messaging app, sources told AFP.
summary: Telegram chief executive Pavel Durov is expected to appear in court Sunday after being arrested by French police at an airport near Paris for alleged offences related to his popular messaging app, sources told AFP.

title: Israel Army Says 3 Soldiers Killed In Gaza Fighting
content: The Israeli military announced on Saturday the deaths of three reserve soldiers killed in fighting in the Gaza Strip the previous day.
summary: The Israeli military announced on Saturday the deaths of three reserve soldiers killed in fighting in the Gaza Strip the previous day.

title: Gaza Talks Set To Resume In Egypt As Fighting Rages
content: Negotiators geared up for a crucial weekend of Gaza ceasefire talks Saturday, as Hamas said it was sending delegates to Cairo but would not participate in the discussions, and fighting raged in the Palestinian territory.
summary: Negotiators geared up for a crucial weekend of Gaza ceasefire talks Saturday, as Hamas said it was sending delegates to Cairo but would not participate in the discussions, and fighting raged in the Palestinian territory.

title: UK PM Keir Starmer To Warn Life Will "Get Worse" Before It Gets "Better"
content: Prime Minister Keir Starmer on Tuesday was poised to warn that life in Britain will "get worse" before it gets "better", in his first major speech since taking office.
summary: Prime Minister Keir Starmer on Tuesday was poised to warn that life in Britain will "get worse" before it gets "better", in his first major speech since taking office.

title: Imran Khan May Be Tried In Military Courts For May 9 Cases: Pak Government
content: Former Pakistan Prime Minister Imran Khan's cases in connection with the May 9 riots might go to military courts, the Pakistan government's spokesperson for legal affairs, Barrister Aqeel Malik, said.
summary: Former Pakistan Prime Minister Imran Khan's cases in connection with the May 9 riots might go to military courts, the Pakistan government's spokesperson for legal affairs, Barrister Aqeel Malik, said.

title: Why NASA Picked Elon Musk's SpaceX To Bring Back Astronauts From Space
content: NASA today picked Elon Musk's SpaceX to bring back Sunita Williams and Barry Wilmore from space next year.
summary: NASA today picked Elon Musk's SpaceX to bring back Sunita Williams and Barry Wilmore from space next year.

title: Ukraine President Calls Putin "Sick Old Man From Red Square" In New Video
content: President Volodymyr Zelensky touted a newly developed Ukrainian "drone missile" on Saturday that he said would take the war back to Russia and scornfully derided Russia's Vladimir Putin as a "sick old man from Red Square".
summary: President Volodymyr Zelensky touted a newly developed Ukrainian "drone missile" on Saturday that he said would take the war back to Russia and scornfully derided Russia's Vladimir Putin as a "sick old man from Red Square".

title: From 8 Days To 8 Months: NASA Astronauts To Return From Space Next Year
content: Two NASA astronauts who flew to the International Space Station in June aboard Boeing's faulty Starliner capsule will need to return to Earth on a SpaceX vehicle early next year, NASA said on Saturday.
summary: Two NASA astronauts who flew to the International Space Station in June aboard Boeing's faulty Starliner capsule will need to return to Earth on a SpaceX vehicle early next year, NASA said on Saturday.
